pike-stand.description: Start in a downward dog position with hands on the ground. Walk your feet closer to your hands while keeping legs straight. Hold this inverted V position.
tips: Look at your hands, not your feet

body-row.description: Lie under a bar or table. Grab the bar with an overhand grip and pull your chest up towards it. Lower yourself back down with control.
tips: Keep your body straight like a plank
Pull your chest to the bar

lunge.description: Step forward into a lunge position. Lower your back knee toward the ground while keeping your front knee over your ankle. Push back to starting position.
tips: Don't let your front knee go past your toes

hollow-body-crunch.description: Lie on your back with arms extended overhead. Press your lower back into the ground and lift your shoulders and legs off the floor into a hollow position.
tips: Keep lower back pressed to floor
